00001 //  AABBLinkedList.h
00002 //  Header file for the AABBLinkedList class
00003 //  Linked List used to store nodes (AABBNode) which contain the co-ordinates of the 
00004 //  boundings boxes which are used for the collsion detection.
00005 //
00006 //      The program splits the world into four quadrants and creates a linked list to
00007 //  store the bounding box details for each
00008 //
00009 //  Author:  Shay Leary
00010 //  March 2005
00011 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 
00013 #ifndef AABBLINKED_LIST_H
00014 #define AABBLINKED_LIST_H
00015 
00016 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 
00018 #include "AABBNode.h"
00019 #include <gl/glut.h>
00020 //#include <GL/freeglut.h>
00021 
00022 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 
00024 class AABBLinkedList
00025 {
00026 public:
00027         // constructor creates pointer to first node
00028         AABBLinkedList() {m_first = new AABBNode;}
00029 
00030         virtual ~AABBLinkedList() {Clear();}
00031 
00032         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 
00034         // clears linked list and frees memory
00035         void Clear();
00036 
00037         // add a node to the start of the linked list
00038         bool AddToStart (GLdouble maxX, GLdouble minX, GLdouble maxY,
00039                                      GLdouble minY, GLdouble maxZ, GLdouble minZ);
00040         
00041         //  set the values of the node data
00042         void SetData(const int &ptrCount,
00043                                  const GLdouble maxX, const GLdouble minX,
00044                                  const GLdouble maxY, const GLdouble minY,
00045                                  const GLdouble maxZ, const GLdouble minZ);
00046 
00047         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048         //  Get Methods
00049         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050         GLdouble GetMaxX (int ptrCount);
00051         GLdouble GetMinX (int ptrCount);
00052         GLdouble GetMaxY (int ptrCount);
00053         GLdouble GetMinY (int ptrCount);
00054         GLdouble GetMaxZ (int ptrCount);
00055         GLdouble GetMinZ (int ptrCount);
00056         
00057         // Return size of list
00058         int GetListSize ();
00059         
00060         // Return the address of the link to the next node in the list
00061     AABBNode *GetNext () const {return m_first->GetNext();}
00062         // Return the address of the link to the first node in the list
00063         AABBNode *GetFirst() const {return m_first;}
00064 
00065 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 
00067 private:
00068         // pointer to first node in list
00069         AABBNode *m_first;
00070 
00071         // used to clear memory
00072         void Delete (AABBNode *before);
00073 
00074         // Privatised copy constructor and assignment operator
00075         AABBLinkedList (const AABBLinkedList &ll) {};
00076         AABBLinkedList &operator = (const AABBLinkedList &ll) {};
00077 };
00078 
00079 #endif
